name: jquery-circular-carousel
description: A library that creates dynamic circular carousels. **Requires jQuery**. Adjustable items, dimensions, angle, durations, offsets. By default, scales non-active items to 0.5. See the [demo](http://sgb-io.github.io/jquery.circular-carousel/demo/).

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist/ && cp js/jquery.circular-carousel.js dist/ && cp css/jquery.circular-carousel.css dist/
scripts.gh-page: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist/ && cp -r demo/* dist/ && cp js/* dist/js/ && cp css/* dist/css/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/js
